name.str: HighCom UHMWPE side plate, NIJ III++

//description: when we use Cordura instead of nylon, the description should be changed to reflect that
description: A full-cut ballistic plate with slightly clipped corners and a single-curve profile, made of UHMWPE.  Manufacturer's logo is proudly displayed on the outward-facing side.  This plate is rated for NIJ III++, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some, approaching the level of NIJ IV protection but not quite qualifying for it.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is a 6″×6″ side panel and can only fit in side panel pouches on a plate carrier.
